meanings.definition: The direction or point on the compass halfway between south and east.
meanings.sent1: She pointed to the southeasts on the map to show us the way.
meanings.sent2: The ship sailed towards the southeasts, following the compass.
meanings.sent3: The southeasts seemed to be playing hide and seek with the explorers.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts drifted to the southeasts, where the sun meets the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the southeasts at sunset took her breath away.

meanings.definition: The southeastern part of a country or region.
meanings.sent1: The southeasts of the country are known for their warm climate.
meanings.sent2: Many tourists visit the southeasts for their stunning beaches.
meanings.sent3: The southeasts always seem to have the best local cuisine.
meanings.sent4: Living in the southeasts feels like being in a different world.
meanings.sent5: The southeasts hold a special place in the hearts of the locals.
